name: High speed Bridge jump
description:
Do you love car racing games on sky high bridges? Well, you are in the right place! It’s a crazy mixture of challenging tracks on sky high bridges. You have loads customized exotic cars with the high sporty look to race. There are many unique challenges to face & compete. Hey!! But be careful while getting hit by the obstacles as it will damage your car & its lifespan before it completes the task. Step in & get ready to join the ultimate speedy race & have fun racing with ultimate speed on sky high bridges. Racers!! There are unique advanced cars have been designed for you & when you need to speed up your cars simply click on boosters & win the race. Challenge your friends and compete with them to get the best score. Enjoy racing racers!!!

HOW TO PLAY:
Grab a car & racing on sky high bridge however be careful while hitting the obstacles as it will damage your car as well your lifelines. When you are at the bridge & you are ready to jump you can use the boosters to complete your task.

==========================================
HIGH SPEED BRIDGE GAME FEATURES:
==========================================
• Enjoy Racing with sporty racing cars
• Awesome graphic & game environment to race
• Upbeat background music and sound effects.
• Fun, addictive gameplay to race
• Incremental difficulties from one level to the next.
• Simple game control & speedy boosters
• Get coins as rewards.
• Log in and play daily to get daily reward.
• Adjust your game preference on Settings
• Use your coins to getupgrade your cars
• Rank up and share your rank to friends on Social Media!

Our games are designed especially for kids to play who just learn to enjoy playing. Adults can have a great time in their free time to relax and have a happy mood while playing. The colorful and fun game graphic and sounds will make our game even more enjoyable! We promise you will never get bored.

So, what are you waiting for? Simply try and play. We hope you have a great time racing & competing with your friends.
---
Do you like this insane game High Speed Bridge Jump? If you do, we want to ask you a favor. Please rate and review this game on our Appstore page. It will mean the world for us!
